resources.string: Please don’t repurpose this PSD or its contents as your own. If you like it and use it, share about it. Most importantly, use it to pitch, design and build amazing application. If you would like to thank me, Please give us one share.

Welcome to Flirtyz, the premiere emoji mobile app that’s designed to help you share your emotions and have fun with the people closest to you. Our Mission is to redefine emojis as we know them, transforming them into Flirtyz, a pioneer in the entertainment world.

Thank you for your interest in Flirtyz uncensored content. A rude, crude, crass, brass tacks type of experience offering trending, controversial and offensive fun that other apps wish they were. Welcome to the party my friends.

Tired of the same boring emojis? Flirtyz provides funny, entertaining, never before seen, trending, controversial and custom emojis inspired by real life people, circumstances, events and mishaps. Flirtyz is the premier emoji mobile app that’s designed to help yo share your emotions and have fun with the people closest to you. Our mission is to re-define emojis as we know them. Transforming emojis into Flirtyz, a pioneer in the entertainment world.

The most controversial emojis in the world? Flirtyz are providing a way for friends to express themselves creatively with humor and entertainment. Flirtyz gives people a visual platform to voice their opinions saying a word. Here’s to free expression!
Have and idea for an awsome emoji? Tell us your thoughts below and have a chance to see your emoji added to our Flirtyz Family
Do you want to download this application?It does not require any special access
How to purchase the Paid Uncensored Flirtyz App. In order to recieve the Paid flirtyz App, please follow the direction below.

1. Click on the Make Payment Button.

 2. Fill out the credit card form.

 3. You will recieve a text message to your mobile phone with a link to receive the Uncensored Flirtyz App.
